title: Ozone, hydrogen peroxide, and peroxymonosulfate disinfection of MS2 coliphage in water
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,824-831
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00527E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zi-Chen Yang, Wen-Long Wang, Zi-Bo Jing, Yi-Qing Jiang, He-Qing Zhang, Min-Yong Lee, Lu Peng, Qian-Yuan Wu
In this study, the disinfection effects of O3, PMS, and H2O2 on MS2 coliphage in deionized (DI) water and secondary effluent water were systematically compared.
